attributes.action: Cap in and out of court settlements re health provision procurement to £50k
attributes.background:
Virgin Care set a precedent when they agreed an out of court settlement of £1.565M when they DIDN'T win the £82M Surrey Child Health Services contract in 2017.  
Paying out this public money only punishes patients.  Lets cap it for the greater good of the NHS!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by "in court settlement". The courts are independent of the UK Government and Parliament. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
